SEARCH
Package com.monexel.expensetracker.service

Class UserServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.monexel.expensetracker.service.UserServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserService
@Service public class UserServiceImpl extends Object implements UserService
Service implementation for managing user accounts in the Expense Tracker application.

This class provides business logic for creating, updating, deleting, and retrieving user details. It also handles password encryption and password update functionality.

Responsibilities:

  • Create new users with encrypted passwords.
  • Retrieve user details by ID or email.
  • Update user details and passwords.
  • Delete users by ID.

Security:

  • Passwords are encrypted using PasswordEncoder before saving to the database.

Exception Handling:

  • ResourceNotFoundException is thrown when a user is not found by ID or email.

Usage Example:

 UserRequest request = new UserRequest();
 request.setName("John Doe");
 request.setEmail("john@example.com");
 request.setPassword("securePassword");
 request.setPhoneNumber("9876543210");
 request.setRole("USER");

 UserResponse response = userService.createUser(request);
Version:
1.0
Author:
Surya Narayanan G
